newsitem.title: CROATIA: Former Bosnian Croat leader Mate Boban dies.
newsitem.headline: Former Bosnian Croat leader Mate Boban dies.

text.p: Former Bosnia Croat nationalist leader Mate Boban died in a Mostar hospital from heart failure on Monday after suffering a brain haemorrhage, the Croatian state news agency HINA reported.
As leader of the Croat community in Bosnia, Boban proclaimed the republic of Herceg-Bosna in August 1993, complete with Croatian local government, education systems and Croatian currency.
He was ousted under U.S. pressure when the Moslem-Croat federation was established in 1994.
